mapper.insert: insert into sys_user_post (user_id, post_id, `status`, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{postId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select user_id, post_id, `status`, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from sys_user_post
